channel.title: [xUbuntu] Server run error
channel.description:
I get this when I try to start my server.
[code] nate@ubuntu:~/RSPS/RSF2P$ java server RSF2P Remake #317 npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. [/code]

item.title: [xUbuntu] Server run error
item.dc:creator: @davidscherman davidscherman
item.description:
@davidscherman wrote:

pure2ownage:

the config files were not found; try to place them into the correct directory.

Sorry to bumb an old ass thread. (New to this st00f) How would i change the directory, I have a pretty good idea but i dont know :O. Thanks

Read full topic
